content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "1 cup white sugar" )
( ing-2 "2 teaspoons baking powder" )
( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon baking soda" )
( ing-4 "1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon" )
( ing-5 "1 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-6 "1 cup buttermilk" )
( ing-7 "1/4 cup vegetable oil" )
( ing-8 "2 eggs" )
( ing-9 "2 teaspoons vanilla extract" )
( ing-10 "2 tablespoons white sugar" )
( ing-11 "1 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )
( ing-12 "2 teaspoons margarine" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:_result ( preheated-oven )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Measure flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder, baking soda, 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon, salt, buttermilk, oil, eggs and vanilla into large mixing bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Measure"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "1 cup sugar"@18:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "baking powder"@31:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "baking soda"@46:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon"@59:83 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt"@85:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "buttermilk"@91:101 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "oil"@103:106 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "eggs"@108:112 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "vanilla"@117:124 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "large mixing bowl"@130:147 / TOOL )
		:_result ( batter-in-bowl )
	)
)

( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "3 minutes"@8:17 / DUR )
		:ppt ( batter-in-bowl / FOOD )
		:_result ( beaten-batter )
	)
)

( inst-4 / R
   :inform ( ac-4-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
      :gol ( greased-pan "prepared loaf pan"@13:30 / TOOL )
      :ppt ( beaten-batter / FOOD )
	:_result batter-in-pan
   )
)

content.text: 6) Combine 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and butter, mixing until crumbly.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "2 tablespoons white sugar"@11:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "1 teaspoon cinnamon"@38:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "butter"@62:68 / FOOD )
		:_result ( butter-mixture )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "mixing"@70:76 / AC
		:ppt ( butter-mixture / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until crumbly"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( crumbly-butter )
	)
)

( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Sprinkle"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( "topping"@12:19 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "smoothed batter"@25:40 / FOOD )
		:_result ( topped-batter )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Using knife, cut in a light swirling motion to give a marbled effect.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "cut"@16:19 / AC
		:mnr ( "a light swirling motion"@23:46 / OTHER )
		:instrument ( tool-8-0 "knife"@9:14 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( topped-batter / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-8-0 "to give a marbled effect"@47:71 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( swirled-batter )
	)
)

( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "50 minutes"@19:29 / DUR )
		:ppt ( swirled-batter / FOOD )
		:_result ( baked-bread )
	)
)

( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Test"@4:8 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-10-0 "toothpick"@14:23 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( baked-bread / FOOD )
		:_result ( tested-bread )
	)
)

content.text: 11) When inserted it should come out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "should come out"@-1:-1 / COPULA
		:subj ( toothpick "it"@18:20 / PRONOUN )
		:obj ( "clean"@-1:-1 / OTHER )
		:when ( cond-11-0 "inserted"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Remove bread from pan to rack to cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "Remove"@4:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tested-bread "bread"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-12-0 "pan"@22:25 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-12-1 "rack"@29:33 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-12-0 "to cool"@34:41 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
